title: Crusader Kings 2 patch 1.06b
description:
Ã‚Â· The date widget arrows in the lobby no longer stay gone after you've looked at your save games
 Ã‚Â· Added a separate set of Muslim feudal (Iqta) laws
 Ã‚Â· Added a separate Muslim invasion CB with longer truce and no taking of all occupied provinces
 Ã‚Â· The success chance for kill plots now increases drastically past 100% Plot Power
 Ã‚Â· MP: Fixed an OOS issue between people with and without SoI. (Unfortunately, this means modders with SoI cannot just script in any number of wives in other religions.)
 Ã‚Â· Fixed a serious but simple error messing up the Spanish localization text
 Ã‚Â· Corrected a load of German text using ';' in the localization, corrupting the text database
 Ã‚Â· Decadence revolter special troops now disband after the war
 Ã‚Â· The game will no longer crash if you have the African Unit Pack DLC but not the Sword of Islam
 Ã‚Â· Exported EMPIRE_CREATION_PIETY_COST to defines

Note from me: the CoA are still messed up, now they show white color instead of cyan in some of them (as was in 1.06)
